index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing an agreement with the State of Washington, Department of Social and Health Services (Office of Aging) for supplemental financial assistance for the City's Project Mainstay Handyman/Homemaker Program; increasing certain objects of expenditure in the 1974 Budget of the Department of Human Resources in connection therewith, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
